summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在 Web 服务器应用程序中处理 ASP.NET 用户配置文件的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to work with ASP.NET user profiles in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源，如数据库中的用户设置。ASP.NET profiles are used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 通过使用配置文件提供程序管理配置文件信息和属性值。Profile information and property values are managed by using a profile provider. 可以通过使用 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中存储配置文件信息类，或通过使用实现自定义数据源中抽象类。Profile information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database by using the class, or in a custom data source by using an implementation of the abstract class. 通过使用配置节，配置 ASP.NET 配置文件。ASP.NET profiles are configured by using the configuration section. ASP.NET 在启用了配置文件的应用程序启动时创建类型的新类`ProfileCommon`，它继承自类。When an application starts that has profiles enabled, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`每个属性在配置部分中定义的类。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property that is defined in the configuration section. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为属性的当前对象。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property of the current object. 你可以创建继承自的自定义配置文件实现抽象类，以及定义用户配置文件未指定配置元素中的属性。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and that defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
